questionTitle: of the students in my class could solve the problem yesterday.
She had to .................. eating sweets after her decaying teeth were pulled out.
He has just gone to his friend's house, ...................... there is a party today.
He will not be coming ............... the meeting because he has too many papers to grade.
English ................................ in many parts of the world.
If you are in a crowd, are you afraid you will ............... a cold?
Whose portrait is it? It's my ..........................
Do you wash your hands all the time because you are afraid ................... germs?
Do you only eat things that are ............... for you?
Lan doesn't work as hard as he ...................... last year.
Do you think that lack of sleep will ............... you?
I remember ........................ you before, but I have forgotten your name.
Are you worrying about ............... on your face?
He walked to the ............ of the river and jumped in.
Are you convinced that life is a fatal ...............?
Mrs Baker told her son: "You have to ......... for being rude to your aunt."
